titles.title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide protection against reductions in Medicare payment amounts to rural hospitals as a result of reductions in wage indices applicable to such hospitals because of census designations of formerly rural areas as urban.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1011)

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: 4/22/1993--Introduced. Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide protection against reductions in Medicare payment amounts to rural hospitals as a result of reductions in wage indices applicable to such hospitals because of census designations of formerly rural areas as urban.
